pageContent: Purpose: We expanded the clinical usefulness of EPIC-CP (Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice) by evaluating its responsiveness to health related quality of life changes, defining the minimally important differences for an individual patient change in each domain and applying it to a sexual outcome prediction model.

metaData.source:
Discussing the sexual consequences of treatment in radiotherapy and urology consultations with couples affected by prostate cancer
